attributes.action: give david beckham a knighthood for services to football and charity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: david beckham to be recognised as one of the greatest ever english players,and for the work he does with children and sport

rejection.details: This is not the appropriate forum for this request, please see:  http://www.honours.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
